sentences.en: a tank moving at full tilt.
As John approached at full tilt he saw a queue of traffic blocking the road.
sentences.cn: 约翰全速接近的时候，看到一大串车辆挡住了道路。

sentences.en: But that tilt was due to a very different cause from this.
sentences.cn: 但是那种倾斜的原因与此大不相同.

sentences.en: He likes to tilt his head forward.
He was running at full tilt when he slipped and fell down.
sentences.cn: 他正全速奔跑时滑了一下,摔倒了.

sentences.en: His car ran full tilt against the tree.
sentences.cn: 他的车以全速撞到了树上.

sentences.en: If you tilt the table, the dishes will slide off onto the floor.
sentences.cn: 如果你使桌子倾斜, 碟子就会滑到地板上.

sentences.en: It has been predicted that the Earth will tilt on its axis , causing catastrophic famine and disease.
sentences.cn: 有人曾预言地球会导致大荒灾和疾病.

sentences.en: Knights used to tilt on horseback.
sentences.cn: 武士们以前在马背上以矛刺击.

sentences.en: Larry Layton's trial is going full tilt right now.
sentences.cn: 拉里·莱顿一案的审判工作即将全面展开。

sentences.en: My mother tilted her head and smiled.
Ned’s mouth tilted upwards slightly at the corners.
Officials tend to tilt toward secrecy from a parochial view of their responsibilities.
sentences.cn: 官吏出于狭隘的责任观念往往倾向于保密.

sentences.en: Some critics were then having a tilt at him.
sentences.cn: 当时有几个评论家正在攻击他.

sentences.en: Suddenly the boat tilted to one side.
The 3-metre-square slabs are on a tilt.
The floor has a tilt to it.
The table is on / at a slight tilt.
sentences.cn: 这张桌子没放平,有点儿歪.

sentences.en: Treatment, though - whether it's chemotherapy or immunotherapy - will tilt the odds in her favour.
sentences.cn: 不过,治疗一下 -- 不管是化学疗法还是免疫疗法 -- 总会使情况对她有利.

words.tran_cn: [航][气象]倾斜；翘起；以言词或文字抨击

phrases.tran_cn: 同假想的敌人（或坏事）作斗争

trans.tran_cn: 倾斜，歪斜，斜坡，坡度，马上刺枪比赛，跳动锤，落锤
trans.tran_en: a movement or position in which one side of something is higher than the other
to move a part of your body, especially your head or chin, upwards or to the side

trans.tran_cn: 倾斜；翘起；以言词或文字抨击
trans.tran_en: to move a part of your body, especially your head or chin, upwards or to the side

trans.tran_cn: 倾斜，〈美〉有倾向性，偏袒，抨击
使倾斜，（在马上）拿枪扎，抨击，攻击

trans.tran_en: to move a part of your body, especially your head or chin, upwards or to the side
